title: Why am I being punished for leaving a 2v5?
body: Everyone else left, why the fuck cant I? Because the 0/35 Blitzcrank will carry me, fuck off and your shitty ass 5 minute priority queue.

replies.body:
>Everyone else left, why the fuck cant I?

http://oi47.tinypic.com/24yr4ia.jpg

Once played 1v5 and it was the most fun. 
Sack up Sackboy and just play every game the best you can.

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mnJAmvRu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-23T13:36:37.383+0000)
>
> Once played 1v5 and it was the most fun. 
> Sack up Sackboy and just play every game the best you can.

Your definition of fun is very different from mine.

Like most things in life it all comes down to perception, and perception is defined by your attitude. 
There's more to get out of games then a win.

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mnJAmvRu,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-23T21:23:04.966+0000)
>
> Like most things in life it all comes down to perception, and perception is defined by your attitude. 
> There's more to get out of games then a win.

If I don't win its a waste of time. See and if I just instalocked ADC we would have won, but again my proof of being nice costs you games.
